message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you a unique product for $100. I've sold 1 out of 2 products so far, and I'm not sure which one is which. I'm hoping you'll take a chance on it!
I trust the randomness and am willing to take a chance on the product.

Thank you for the information. Based on your positive feedback and the fact that one out of two products was of high quality, I am willing to take a chance and purchase the current product.
